Package com.pratima.todoly

Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pratima.todoly.TaskList
  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a very simple ToDoList(todoly) with Project,TaskName,Date and time. New items can be added at the end and removed from any other position. Update the existing data field in the 'todoly'. Mark the finished task. Save and exit the task.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    pratimashegokar

      • addTask

        public void addTask​(java.lang.String taskName,
                    java.lang.String completionDateString,
                    java.lang.String project)
        Adds task to the list. This method also converts the string date to LocalDateTime
        Parameters:
        taskName - The name of the task to be added.
        completionDateString - String which contains date and time for the end date.
        project - The name of the project.

      • printAllTasks

        public void printAllTasks()
        Print all tasks from the list

      • removeTask

        public boolean removeTask​(java.lang.String taskName)
        Remove specific task from the list.
        Parameters:
        taskName - The name of the task that want to remove from list.
        Returns:
        boolean value whether task removed or not.

      • markFinished

        public boolean markFinished​(java.lang.String taskName)
        Mark specific task from the list as Finished.
        Parameters:
        taskName - The name of the task that want to Marked.
        Returns:
        boolean value whether task marked or not.

      • updateTask

        public boolean updateTask​(java.lang.String taskName)
        Update specific task from the list which name is matching with taskName. or just update one field.
        Parameters:
        taskName - The name of the task that which should update.
        Returns:
        boolean value whether task updated or not.

      • getTask

        public Task getTask​(java.lang.String taskName)
        Get task by taskName in the list.
        Parameters:
        taskName - the name of the task which we are finding in the list.
        Returns:
        Task if found else null
